-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | fortran90 namelist parser/pretty printer
--   
@package namelist
@version 0.1.0

module Text.Namelist.Types
data Index
Index :: Int -> Index
Range :: (Maybe Int) -> (Maybe Int) -> (Maybe Int) -> Index
data Key
Key :: (CI String) -> Key
Indexed :: (CI String) -> [Index] -> Key
Sub :: (CI String) -> Key -> Key
data Value
Integer :: Int -> Value
Real :: Double -> Value
Complex :: (Complex Double) -> Value
Logical :: Bool -> Value
String :: String -> Value
Array :: [Value] -> Value
(:*) :: Int -> Value -> Value
Null :: Value
data Pair
(:=) :: Key -> Value -> Pair
data Group
Group :: (CI String) -> [Pair] -> Group
instance Typeable Index
instance Typeable Key
instance Typeable Value
instance Typeable Pair
instance Typeable Group
instance Show Index
instance Read Index
instance Data Index
instance Eq Index
instance Show Key
instance Read Key
instance Data Key
instance Eq Key
instance Show Value
instance Read Value
instance Data Value
instance Eq Value
instance Show Pair
instance Read Pair
instance Data Pair
instance Eq Pair
instance Show Group
instance Read Group
instance Data Group
instance Eq Group

module Text.Namelist.Parser
namelist :: Stream s m Char => ParsecT s u m [Group]

module Text.Namelist.Pretty
data DString
toString :: DString -> String
class Pretty a
ppr :: Pretty a => PrettyConfig -> a -> DString
data PrettyConfig
PrettyConfig :: (String -> String) -> String -> Mode -> PrettyConfig
prettyLogical :: PrettyConfig -> String -> String
pairSeparator :: PrettyConfig -> String
mode :: PrettyConfig -> Mode
data Mode
Compact :: Mode
Large :: Int -> Mode
indent :: Mode -> Int
instance Pretty [Group]
instance Pretty Group
instance Pretty [Pair]
instance Pretty Pair
instance Pretty Value
instance Pretty Key
instance Pretty [Index]
instance Pretty Index
instance Default PrettyConfig
instance Monoid DString

module Text.Namelist
parse :: String -> Either ParseError [Group]
class Pretty a
pretty :: Pretty a => a -> String
prettyCompact :: Pretty a => a -> String
